overview: Elle yachting has been founded in 1998 under the leadership of Mr Recep Cetin and is officially licensed.he has experience over 20 years but before 1998 as a crew member experience from some gulets. The company, incorporated in Turkey under the company name Elle Turi.tic.ltd.şti received the permission from the Turkish Ministry of Tourism to operate under the agency name Elle yachting. The base of our company operations is Marmaris, located at the heart of Turkey’s yachting itineraries. With affiliate offices in Fethiye, Bodrum and Marmaris,Elle yachting is able to provide all yachting services along the Turkish coast and neighbouring Greek islands.
